resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml). Often served in a cappuccino cup.
A tall, mild milk coffee (about 150-300 ml). An espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam poured over it.
A coffee drink consisting of espresso and a milk foam mixture. Served in a cappuccino cup.
A concentrated form of coffee served in small, strong shots. The base for many coffee drinks.
A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte. Made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate.
